sentences.sentence: The Nissan Versa has earned good marks in the first-ever crash test of minicars.
sentences.translation: 日产骐达在小型汽车的首次碰撞实验中赢得了较好的分数。

sentences.sentence: Both the minicars and midsize cars were traveling 40 miles per hour, so the crash occurs at 80 M.P.H.
sentences.translation: 微型车和中型车均以每小时40英里的速度行驶，因此碰撞时速度为每小时80英里。

sentences.sentence: Mitsubishi Motors aims to manufacture low-priced vehicles based on minicars jointly developed with Nissan Motor Co.
sentences.translation: 三菱汽车旨在制造廉价的汽车基于与日产汽车公司联合开发的小型汽车。
